orderDeclined: {{company}} did not accept your order at this time. Please try again some other time.
orderQueued: Your order #{{orderNum}} is queued for preparation
orderNotPickedUp: Your order #{{orderNum}} was not picked up! Did you forget?
orderDispatched: Your order #{{orderNum}} is on its way!
orderDelivered: Your order #{{orderNum}} was delivered. Thanks again!
orderRequested_delivery:
'Delivery Time: '+ deliverytime +'
'+ 'Customer: '+ this.passport.user.first_name +' '+ this.passport.user.last_name.charAt(0) +'
'+'Order Details: ' + orderDetail +'
';
orderRequested_pickup:
'Pickup Time: '+ pickuptime +'
'+ 'Customer: '+ this.passport.user.first_name +' '+ this.passport.user.last_name.charAt(0) +'
'+'Order Details: ' + orderDetail +'
';
